name: attendance_scanner
description: QR code based attendance with SQLite, Express, Firebase Auth, and Braintree

scripts.build: npm run build:format && npm run build:icons
scripts.dev: ATT_CODE_DIR=.data/att_codes DB_FILE=./.data/ATT.db DEVELOPMENT=true PORT=3000 nodemon --inspect -r dotenv/config ./server/server.js
scripts.predeploy: git checkout main && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo 'Please commit your changes before deploying' && exit 1)
scripts.predev: open http://localhost:3000 || start chrome "http://localhost:3000" || google-chrome 'http://localhost:3000' || echo 'Could not open browser automatically. Please open http://localhost:3000 manually'
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && ATT_CODE_DIR=.data/att_codes DB_FILE=:memory: node -r dotenv/config --test --experimental-test-coverage --test-reporter=spec --test-reporter=tap --test-reporter-destination=stdout --test-reporter-destination=tap.info && npm run test:badges
